name: Squids® 3770 Tape Measure Trap
short_description:
Tape Measure Trap securely wraps around most standard tape measures. D-Ring connection point attaches to a lanyard to prevent drops.

Features

  • 1200D and 600D polyester main material
  • Hook and loop straps secure tape measure inside trap for safe and easy tethering
  • Zinc-plated cast alloy D-Ring
  • Maximum safe working capacity: 2 lbs. (0.9 kg)
  • Third party tested using a 2:1 safety factor
  • Patented design

Application

  • Heavy Construction
  • Utilities
  • Mining/Extraction
  • Roofing
  • Maintenance
  • Arborists
  • Oil & Gas
  • Telecommunications

name: Squids® 3790 Tool Shackle - 2-Pack
short_description:
Stainless steel U shaped shackles connect to waisted tools (tapered mid sections) or tools with captive holes, creating clean, secure attachment points for tethering.

Features

  • Stainless steel (#304) material
  • One step retrofit attachment for tethering point
  • Connects around midsection of a waisted tool
  • Secure by adding a drop of adhesive and tightening
  • Maximum safe working capacity: 15lbs (6.8kg)
  • Third-party certified to a 2:1 safety factor

Application

  • Telecommunications
  • Municipalities
  • Construction
  • Utilities
  • Wind Energy
  • Oil & Gas
  • Power Generation
  • Railway

name: Chill-Its® 6602 Evaporative Cooling Towel
short_description:
Cooling Towel: Dampen this synthetic space age towel to create a cooling aid significantly colder than ambient air.

Features

  • Advanced PVA cooling technology
  • Super-evaporative, feels significantly cooler than ambient air
  • Activates fast and easy - run under cold water for one minute
  • Wear for hours or for quick relief
  • Simply re-wet to reactivate
  • Machine washable
  • Size: 13in x 29.5in (33cm x 75cm)

Application

  • Construction
  • Freight/Baggage
  • Drilling/Mining
  • Iron/Steel Work
  • Agriculture
  • Solar
  • Landscaping/Grounds

name: Chill-Its® 6685 Dry Evaporative Cooling Vest
short_description:
Dry Evaporative Cooling Vest: fill with water and enjoy hours of cooling relief and comfort.

Features

  • Provides immediate and long lasting cooling
  • Up to 3 days of cooling ability
  • FIll vest with 13-20oz (400-600ml) water to activate
  • Lightweight, durable and machine washable
  • V-neck with zip closure
  • Mesh side panels provide additional ventilation and stretch
  • Patented
  • Do not clean the inside reservoir. Cooling material is treated with an anti-microbial that inhibits mold growth. Keep cap closed at all times to maintain vest's effectiveness.

Application

  • Construction
  • Trades
  • Maintenance
  • Landscaping/Grounds
  • Assembly/Fabrication
  • Material Handling
  • Freight/Baggage
  • Warehousing/Distribution
  • Iron/Steel Fabrication

name: Skullerz® Dagr Safety Glasses
short_description:

Features

  • Meet ANSI Z87.1, CSA Z94.3 + & MIL-PRF 32432 Ballistic Impact
  • Scratch-resistant lens blocks 99.9% of harmful UV
  • Sleek blade frame with coinjection rubber temples
  • Rubber nose pieces prevent slipping
  • Temple accessory slot also improves air flow
  • Patented design

  • Scratch-resistant lens blocks 99.9% of harmful UV
  • Removeable rubber temples converts Loki to goggle
  • Available Fog-Off™ technology won't wash, wear off

name: N-Ferno® 6490W Replacement Wall Charger
description:
Outer Layer / Heated Jacket W/ Removable Sleeves Includes the 6490J Heated Jacket W/Removable Sleeves (includes adapter extension wire), the 6490B Rechargeable 7.4V Lithium Ion Battery, and 6490W Battery Wall Charger.

Features

  • 2 heat zones distribute heat to core body regions: front chest and back
  • 3 heat settings: high, medium, low
  • Preheat mode option for increased warm up time
  • Adapter extension wire allows user to heat jacket from alternative power source
  • Easy touch controller button to navigate through heat settings and pre-heat option
  • Up to 9 hours of continuous heat on low setting, 5 hours on medium setting, and 3 hours on high setting
  • Water and wind resistant outer shell
  • Soft, warm fleece lining.
  • 3 external pockets
  • Convenient battery holder pocket inside jacket with zipper closure
  • Rechargeable Battery: 7.4V, 5200 MAH Lithium Ion Battery
  • Replaceable parts available: 6490B battery, 6490W battery wall charger
  • Optional accessory: 6490C cigarette converter allows user to heat jacket without battery
  • Removable sleeves zip off for vest option
  • Wall Charger, compatible with 7.4V Lithium Ion battery

Application

  • Road Construction
  • Heavy Construction
  • Building Construction
  • Iron/Steel Work
  • Oil/Gas Refining
  • Drilling/Mining
  • Freight/Baggage
  • Warehousing/Distribution
  • Landscaping/Grounds

The first layer of defense against Old Man Winter. The rugged 500D shell repels water and protects you from the wind and cold while remaining breathable for all day comfort.

Features

  • Rugged 500D Nylon shell with breathable water repellent treatment to stay dry and comfortable
  • Thermal insulated quilted sleeves for easy on/off
  • 1600D Nylon reinforcement zones in heavy wear areas to hold up through the toughest conditions
  • Exterior back document pocket
  • Exterior front cell phone pocket
  • Interior audio pocket to hold cell phone or other device
  • Heavy Duty YKK zippers with storm flap to seal out wind and rain
  • Removable hood with adjustable draw cords customizable fit
  • Drawstring waist works to keep out the cold
  • Adjustable hook & loop cuffs for easy use when wearing gloves
  • Spandex cuffs for wind protection and to keep out the cold
  • Reflective accents help keep workers safe and seen
size_info: SMLXL2XL3XL

description:
These insulated bibs /overalls provide the ultimate in durability, weather protection, and quality outerwear. Complete with removable knee/shin pads and 1600D nylon reinforcement in heavy wear areas.

Features

  • Rugged 500D Nylon outer shell provides protection from the elements – wind, repelling water, and keeping cold out
  • 1600D Nylon reinforcement zones in heavy wear areas to hold up through the toughest conditions
  • Several pockets including hip and chest for extra storage
  • Full-length YKK zippers on each leg to easily put on and take off without removing work boots
  • Easy removable PE foam knee/shin pads for convenience
  • "Be Tenacious" non-slip, adjustable elastic straps for maximum comfort and the perfect fit
  • Reflective accents help keep workers safe and seen
  • Straight leg design with inside elastic bottom, snap closure liner to protect against snow and water
size_info: SMLXL2XL3XL

description:
Outer Layer / Thermal Weight / Jacket: Your first layer of defense against that magnificent bastard, Old Man Winter. Keeps your fire lit in the deep freeze and allows remarkable range of motion.

Features

  • Rugged 300D Polyester shell with PU & UV treatments
  • Soft, warm fleece lining

small_image_label: ERGODYNE 12967 SHAX 6100 LIGHTWEIGHT INDUSTRIAL UMBRELLA 7.5FT DIAMETE
thumbnail_label: ERGODYNE 12967 SHAX 6100 LIGHTWEIGHT INDUSTRIAL UMBRELLA 7.5FT DIAMETE
summary: The SHAX® 6100 Heavy-Duty Work Umbrella provides fast and portable relief from the elements to increase worker productivity and reduce weather-related delays. Engineered with a powder-coated steel frame, a reinforced weather-proof canopy and 300 denier polyester material, this lightweight umbrella is built to last. The unique tilt-top feature allows users to shade themselves from ultraviolet (UV) sun rays any hour of the day. A vented lime top provides airflow and visibility, making this a great construction umbrella for those scorching hot jobsites. The polyester shell also has protective coatings (Polyurethane (PU) and UV) which provide the ultimate shelter from sun/UV, rain, and wind. Whether working in a bucket, or on the ground, this heavy-duty umbrella is the ideal solution to help prevent heat-related illnesses on any residential, commercial, agricultural, construction or highway setting.
meta_keyword: ERGODYNE 12967 SHAX 6100 LIGHTWEIGHT INDUSTRIAL UMBRELLA 7.5FT DIAMETE

name: ERGODYNE 18376 PROFLEX 375 COMPACT KNEELING PAD
summary: The ProFlex® 375 Small Kneeling Pad is the perfect personal kneeling pad for comfort in static kneeling applications. This kneeling mat is small enough to throw in your tool organizer to bring to each jobsite, or to easily use around the house. The thick nonconductive nitrile rubber (NBR) closed cell foam will keep its shape over time, and won’t absorb liquids making it the perfect portable solution for knee protection. Designed for kneeling on cold surfaces, hard steel, concrete, grating, gravel and wet surfaces. Also great as a garden kneeler or for work around the house. The small kneeling pad is great for mechanics, construction, plumbers, electricians, flooring, or anyone looking for quick, comfortable knee support without having to strap on work knee pads. Pain-free kneeling increases productivity and helps prevent common knee injuries.

name: Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit
meta_title: Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit
small_image_label: Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit
thumbnail_label: Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit
description: The Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit contains tool attachment and tool lanyard solutions specific for tools commonly used by tower climbers in the telecom industry, as well as linemen and antenna workers.
summary:
Includes:
  • Three - 3780L Power Tool Trap
  • One - 3705 Wire Screwgate Tool Tail (6-Pack)
  • One - 3700 Web Tool Tail - Medium (6-Pack)
  • One - 3755 Self-Adhering Tape Trap (12ft / 3.7m)
  • One - 3770L Tape Measure Trap
  • One - 3740S Hand Tool Trap - Small (4-Pack)
  • One - 3740M Hand Tool Trap - Medium (4-Pack)
  • One - 3740L Hand Tool Trap - Large (4-Pack)
  • One - 3740XL Hand Tool Trap - XL (4-Pack)
  • One - 3790 Shackle Trap - Small (2-Pack)
  • Two - 3790 Shackle Trap - Medium (2-Pack)
  • Two - 3790 Shackle Trap - Large (2-Pack)
  • One - 3713 Elastic Loop Tool Tails™ Swivel (3-Pack)
  • One - 3118F(x) Tool Lanyard
  • One - 3108F(x) Tool Lanyard
  • One - 3166 Coil Tool Lanyard
  • One - 3011 Retractable Tool Lanyard
